definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.chinese: 兵士們扳起火槍的槍栓準備射擊。

sentences.english: Control the spray gun bolt after finishing painting, put the special watering pot on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 塗料塗層完成後控制槍栓，將專用噴壺放置地面。

sentences.english: Youngblood's hand goes to his holster. The tower guards CLICK-CLACK their rifle bolts.
sentences.chinese: 楊伯拉德的手伸向槍套，哨兵也“咔啦”拉上槍栓。

sentences.english: His hand felt for the bolt of the machine gun.
sentences.chinese: 他的手摸到了機槍的槍栓。
